_header: Sir Thomas I tell you plain / He that made this book took great pain
_description: Scribe’s or stationer’s assurance of care taken in making the book — one couplet

OxfExe129.Transcription:
ser thomas I tell you playnhe that made thys boke toke greate
                    payne
OxfExe129.Editions:
Watson,  Andrew G.,
                        ed.  
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Medieval Manuscripts of Exeter College,
                Oxford.
         Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2000: 114.
